file_insights.changes: Added animation imports and state management for toast animations
file_insights.impact: Enhanced user feedback with visual animations for toast notifications
key_additions: Import slideInUp, fadeOut animations from utils/animations
Added isExiting state to track animation phase
Implemented handleClose with animation delay using setTimeout
Applied sx prop with conditional animation based on isExiting state
Updated current phase to 'Advanced Feedback Animations'

patterns_discovered.description: Using boolean state (isExiting) to control animation phase transitions between entrance and exit
patterns_discovered.benefit: Allows orchestrated multi-phase animations without race conditions

patterns_discovered.description: Using setTimeout to delay state updates until animations complete, preventing premature UI state changes
patterns_discovered.benefit: Ensures visual continuity and prevents jarring state transitions

patterns_discovered.description: Using ternary operator in sx prop to select animation based on state condition
patterns_discovered.benefit: Dynamic animation selection without CSS class toggling

patterns_discovered.description: Importing duration and easing from shared utils/animations module
patterns_discovered.benefit: Ensures consistent animation timing across components

gotchas_discovered.description: The setTimeout duration must match the CSS animation duration (duration.normal) to prevent animation cutoff or state desync
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Using imported duration constant ensures alignment between JS timing and CSS timing

gotchas_discovered.description: The sx selector targets both '.MuiSnackbarContent-root' and '.MuiPaper-root' to ensure animation applies to all relevant elements
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Dual selector approach ensures animation covers all potential Material-UI wrapper elements

gotchas_discovered.description: Without the isExiting state and timeout, closing immediately would remove the element before fade-out animation plays
gotchas_discovered.mitigation: Two-phase close: set isExiting true, wait for animation, then set open false

approach_outcome.objective: Enhance ToastProvider with slide-in and fade-out animations
approach_outcome.execution: Directly modified ToastProvider component to add animation state management and apply keyframe animations via sx prop
approach_outcome.result: Toast notifications now display with smooth slide-in entrance animation and fade-out exit animation
approach_outcome.efficiency: completed in single attempt with no rework required

recommendations.suggestion: Consider extracting animation configuration into a separate configuration object to reduce sx complexity
recommendations.rationale: sx prop with nested ternary could become harder to maintain if animations become more complex

recommendations.suggestion: Add unit tests to verify animation state transitions and timeout cleanup to prevent memory leaks
recommendations.rationale: setTimeout without cleanup could cause memory leaks if component unmounts during animation

recommendations.suggestion: Verify that animation keyframes in utils/animations module use GPU-accelerated properties (transform, opacity)
recommendations.rationale: Ensures smooth 60fps animations without jank from layout thrashing

recommendations.suggestion: Consider adding prefers-reduced-motion media query support to disable animations for users who prefer reduced motion
recommendations.rationale: WCAG accessibility requirement for users sensitive to animations
